body_html:
I likely chose the wrong words it was a canned response. I understand it can be frustrating as teams follow different processes and we did not document our action. We essentially declared a "bug bankruptcy" and closed most issues older than ~6 months after a quick review.

That said if you are seeing this behavior on TF 1.1 or 1.2, I am happy to reopen and try to push it back through Triage again.

While wordy, I cannot stress enough no malice is intended and I read each bug in detail before closing. I knew I would make a few mistakes and counted on people responding back. Thank you for the ping.

body:
I likely chose the wrong words it was a canned response.  I understand it can be frustrating as teams follow different processes and we did not document our action.  We essentially declared a "bug bankruptcy" and closed most issues older than ~6 months after a quick review.  

That said if you are seeing this behavior on TF 1.1 or 1.2, I am happy to reopen and try to push it back through Triage again.   

While wordy, I cannot stress enough no malice is intended and I read each bug in detail before closing.  I knew I would make a few mistakes and counted on people responding back.  Thank you for the ping.
